keyPolicies.policyDescription: David Lidington argues for an alternative route for the High Speed 2 (HS2) rail link that would cause less environmental damage.

issues.environment: Expresses concern over the environmental impact of the HS2 rail link on the Aylesbury area.

housing.content: The HS2 rail link proposed route brings it close to Walton Court, as indicated by the photograph showing the proximity to the brook.

quotes.text: We have to put together the strongest possible case for an alternative route that would cause less environmental damage.
quotes.source: David Lidington on the High Speed Rail Link

quotes.text: Let's make it clear that we are not prepared to blindly accept the route that Labour proposes.
quotes.source: Theresa Villiers MP, Conservative Transport Spokesman

images.caption: David Lidington sitting at a table looking at documents.
The line will come close to Walton Court, a photo shows the brook.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet discusses details on how the public can get involved with consultations regarding the HS2 rail link and the importance of getting community input.
